reviewText: This is a must have  Very funny and amusing  A must for all Mark Lowry fans
It gets a five for content, if only I could have found it on DVD.
I have always enjoyed Mark and this tape is one of the best. I would recomend it to everyone who loves a good story

It was verry good as is all of Mark's comedy stuff.
It was my fault that I ordered it in VHS, lucky I still had a VHS player. I will pay more attention the next time.

Mark Lowry has a style all his own. His a fine Christian comedian who shares Christs love without preaching. There is nothing wrong with preaching. Sometimes especially when we are down we need a softer approach to life, one that makes us laugh and not take ourselves too seriously.
